mapper.sql: id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, icon, url, menu_type, visible, perms, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.icon,m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark from sys_menu m where m.deleted = 0 and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 'Y' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.icon, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where m.deleted = 0 and ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 'Y' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where m.deleted = 0 and m.visible = 'Y' and m.perms <> '' and rm.role_id in
#{item}
select perms from sys_menu where deleted = 0 and visible = 'Y' and perms <> ''

select sm.id, sm.menu_name, sm.parent_id, sm.order_num, sm.icon, sm.url, sm.menu_type, sm.visible, sm.perms, sm.create_by, sm.create_time,sm.update_by, sm.update_time, sm.remark, child.menu_name as parent_name from sys_menu sm left join sys_menu child on sm.parent_id = child.id where sm.id = #{id}
